item.title: The Starting Point for the Agent
item.description:
Building agents with LLM is implemented much more into reality from a cool concept. Planning, Tool Calling, Acting, Self-Reflection are the standard 4 steps of the Agent Architecture, or the Agentic AI now.

We can learn more from the starting point for the Agent in this article:

  • LLM Powered Autonomous Agents
